description:
LFX Mentorship Showcase (Open to All Attendees; No Additional Fee or Registration Required) - Moderated by Shuah Khan, The Linux Foundation

Speakers: Shuah Khan, Vivek Vishal, Nitish Kumar, Gurmannat Sohal, K Sanjay Kumar, Suyash Nayan, Sarthak Negi, Deep Poharkar
Hosted by Shuah Khan, Kernel Maintainer & Fellow, The Linux Foundation

1. From User Experience to Code Quality: Enhancing litmusctl Through LFX Mentorship. - Deep Poharkar, LitmusChaos

2. A Reflection on the LFX Mentorship Program - Gurmannat Sohal, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Roorkee

3, Benchmarking Hyperledger Besu's Private Networks (QBFT, IBFT & Clique) Using Hyperledger Caliper - Suyash Nayan, OS Contributor

4. Breaking Down Barriers: Strategies for Making Open Source Contributions Accessible to Students - K. Sanjay Kumar, OS Contributor

5. Journey from a Open Source Contributor to Become the Maintainer - Vivek Vishal, Layer5

6. Kubernetes way of automating to manage their System Packages: Introduction
title: LFX Mentorship Showcase - Moderated by Shuah Khan, The Linux Foundation

description:
Turn your online connections into face-to-face conversations! Meet with your friends, colleagues, and community members at the Kubecon + CloudNativeCon NA this November 12-15  in Salt Lake City! 

Secure your spot: https://events.linuxfoundation.org/kubecon-cloudnativecon-north-america/

#kubecon #cloudnativecon #AI #kubernetes #opensource
title: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon Experience
